poemsDataJson.list_full: 陸奥(みちのく)の しのぶもぢずり 誰(たれ)ゆゑに 乱(みだ)れそめにし 我(われ)ならなくに
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Like Michinoku prints//Of the tangled leaves of ferns,//It is because of you//That I have become confused;//But my love for you remains.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Michinoku no|Shinobu moji-zuri|Tare yue ni|Midare some ni shi|Ware nara nakuni
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: みたれそめにし われならなくに
poemsDataJson.author: 河原左大臣(かわらのさだいじん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 相手のために乱れてしまった心の強い高ぶり
